subject: Golf
Country Clubs
lead_paragraph: Rick Hartmann of Atlantic Golf Club in Bridgehampton, N.Y., shot a four-under-par 67 to hold a one-stroke lead after the first round of the 92nd Met Open Championship at The Meadow Brook Club in Jericho, N.Y. A stroke behind Hartmann were Mark Schaare of Knob Hill (N.J.), Charlie Meola of Fairview Country Club in Greenwich, Conn., and Anthony Casalino of Willow Ridge in Westchester County. Andrew Giuliani of Van Cortlandt, the 2006 M.G.A. Player of the Year, was at par 71.
